name: Akira Tanaka
thoughts: I absolutely loved 'Attack on Titan'! The plot twists kept me on the edge of my seat, and the character development is amazing.

title: Miyu Suzuki
thoughts: ‘My Hero Academia’ was so inspiring! I loved seeing the heroes grow and the teamwork between characters is awesome.

title: Haruto Yamamoto
thoughts: I enjoyed 'Demon Slayer' a lot. The animation quality is breathtaking, and the story pulled me in immediately.

title: Sakura Fujimoto
thoughts: ‘Your Name’ left me speechless. The emotions, visuals, and soundtrack are perfect. Definitely a masterpiece.

title: Ren Kobayashi
thoughts: I liked 'One Piece' because it’s so long but never boring! Luffy and the crew’s adventures always make me laugh and feel excited.
